name: tdarr
tagline: A distributed platform for transcoding and optimizing media libraries
description: Tdarr is a distributed, self-hosted video transcoding and library optimization platform. It uses plugins, workers, and rules to automatically transcode, scan, and clean up media libraries via a powerful web UI.

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Distribute transcoding workload across multiple worker nodes for faster processing

features.title: Plugin System
features.description: Use community plugins or create custom ones to define transcoding rules and workflows

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Automatically scan media libraries to identify files that need transcoding or optimization

features.title: Codec Conversion
features.description: Convert videos between codecs like H.264, H.265, AV1 for compatibility or space savings

features.title: REST API
features.description: Leverage GPU acceleration for faster transcoding using NVENC, QuickSync, or VAAPI

features.title: Queue Management
features.description: Monitor and control transcoding queues with priority settings and manual intervention options
